casebody.data:
UNITED STATES, petitioner,
v.
Clifford Raymond SALAS. No. 18-428. Supreme Court of the United States June 28, 2019.

Motion of respondent for leave to proceed in forma pauperis granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Tenth Circuit denied.

Justice GORSUCH took no part in the consideration or decision of this motion and this petition.
